snippet.title: Gex Trailer 1996
snippet.description:
Gex Trailer 1996

Official Content From Crystal Dynamics

Help that wise-cracking, smart-alec lizard get to the land of Rezopolis. There are four worlds to travel and many enemies along the way, but you can kill them with your whipping tail and amazing jumping abilities.
Platforms: Sega Saturn, Sony PlayStation, PC CD

Sega Saturn, Sony PlayStation, PC CD
, Adventure,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Gex
